skills.title: Software Developer
skills.description:
- Designed and implemented resilient APIs using Node.js and Express to optimize market research processes, ensuring seamless and efficient data retrieval and analysis for a Market Research App.
 - Automated build and deployment processes, reducing development lifecycle time by 20%.
- Implemented Elasticsearch-based database, optimizing data management with a 35% enhancement in efficiency.
 - Contributed to the development of a Non-Fungible Token (NFT) Marketplace, enhancing features and implementing secure collaboration functionalities.
 - Conducted team code reviews, achieving a 25% decrease in errors and a 15% improvement in code quality.

skills.title: Software Developer Intern
skills.description:
- Developed a weather application using React and JavaScript, featuring a dynamic search functionality for efficient filtering and display of weather information across different Indian states, elevating the overall user experience and accessibility.
-  Integrated an open-source WeatherAPI into the application using Axios for seamless data retrieval, displaying key information such as temperature, region, and local time for the selected state.
